What is (are) 3-beta-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase deficiency ?,"3-beta ()-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase (HSD) deficiency is an inherited disorder that affects hormone-producing glands including the gonads (ovaries in females and testes in males) and the adrenal glands.
